### getAttributeValue() {#ac303e4318857e7a74047f04168c5f697}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; DWARFFormValue &gt; DWARFAbbreviationDeclaration::getAttributeValue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> uint64&#95;t DIEOffset, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a1424c28b6a65587442fbd9d87726c2c7">dwarf::Attribute</a> Attr, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> &amp; U) const</>}>
Extract a DWARF form value from a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> specified by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> offset.

Extract an attribute value for a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> given the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> offset and the attribute.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">

<ParametersListItem name="U">the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> the contains the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
Optional DWARF form value if the attribute was extracted.
</SectionUser>
